messages.message: we are experimenting running CI on github action runners instead of jenkins, one of the features is to DM you on Slack once the CI run is completed. read the :thread: if you are interested in trying it out

few notes:
1. This will not replace Jenkins CI in short term, and Jenkins CI is still the required check instead of the new CI, and we will make announcement when we are ready to make the switch
2. Admiral and control-plane tests arenâ€™t passing in new infra because they require root access
3. We are still tweaking the infra so there will be downtime occasionally for maintenance
if you want to opt-in, simply update this file https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/.github/configs/ci-dm-me by adding your github handle and your slack ID
